title: Attempting to reconnect, internet is fine.
body:
I was just in a game, and I got hit with attempting to reconnect. At first I thought something was wrong with my net, but after doing a speed test, everything was fine. I'm able to load youtube videos normally as well. 

Anyone else having issues staying connected right now?

replies.body: There doesn't seem to have been any service issues during this time.  Though your internet might be fine, you can still have problem connecting to specific servers.  Try out the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide if this is still happening to tune up your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Funny how often this happens to people on just this new client and yet riot refuses to review and correct the issue.
